verses.text: PEA ko ia, ko e me‘a ‘i he kātaki mamahi ‘e Kalaisi ‘i hono anga kakano, ko ia ke mou ‘ai ‘e kimoutolu foki mo‘omou kofu tau ‘a e fakakaukau pē ko ia, ‘o pehē, Ko ia kuo ne kātaki mamahi ‘i he kakano kuo faka‘ata‘atā mei he angahala;
Koe‘uhi ke ‘oua te mou toe mo‘ui‘aki ‘a e ngaahi holi ‘a e tangata, ka ko hono toe ‘o homou taimi ‘i he kakano ke mou mo‘ui ‘aki ‘a e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua.

Seuke, kuo lahi pē ‘a e taimi kuo hili ke fai‘aki ‘a e loto ‘o e Senitaile; ‘a ia na‘a mou fou ‘i he ngaahi pau‘u fakalielia, mo e ngaahi holikovi, mo e fa‘a uaine‘ia, mo e ngaahi kātoanga kai, mo e ngaahi kātoanga inu kava; pea mo e me‘a ko ia ‘oku tāpuhā ‘a e ngaahi feingalotu ki he ‘aitoli:
‘a ia ‘oku nau ofo ‘i he ‘ikai te mou ō ai mo kinautolu ki he pitenga ko ia ‘o e mo‘ui fakalusa, ‘o nau lau‘ikovi kimoutolu–
‘a e fa‘ahinga te nau hopo ‘i he ‘ao ‘o‘ona, ‘a ia ‘oku ne tali teuteu ke ne fakamāu‘i ‘a e kau mo‘ui mo e kau pekia.
He ko hono ‘uhinga ia na‘e malanga‘aki ai ‘a e Kōsipeli ki he kau pekia foki, koe‘uhi ke nau nofo kuo fakamaau? fakatangata honau anga kakano, ka nau mo‘ui faka‘otua ‘a honau anga laumālie.
Ka ko eni kuo panaki ‘a e ngata‘anga ‘o e me‘a kotoa pē: ko ia mou fakama‘uma‘u mu‘a, ‘o mou mo‘ui faka‘ehi‘ehi, koe‘uhi ke mou fa‘a lotu,
sinoeme‘a ke mou tauhi ai pē ho‘omou fe‘ofa‘aki ke tūkuingata pē: he ko e ‘ofa ‘oku ne ‘ufi‘ufi ha fu‘ufu‘unga angahala.
Ke mou fetauhi‘aki kimoutolu ‘aki ‘a e mafai fakalaumālie ne mou takitaha ma‘u, ‘i he ‘alunga ‘o ‘ene ma‘u, ‘o taau mo ha kau sētuata lelei ‘o e kelesi faifio ‘a e ‘Otua.

Kapau ko e fai malanga ‘a ha taha, ke ne fai ko e folofola ‘a e ‘Otua; kapau ‘oku fai ha tauhi ‘ofa ‘e ha taha, ke ne fai ‘o ngali ko ha toko taha kuo ne ma‘u ‘ene mafai mei he ‘Eiki; koe‘uhi ke fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua ‘i he me‘a kotoa pē ‘ia Sīsū Kalaisi, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘o ‘Ene ‘Afio ‘a e kolōlia mo e māfimafi ‘o laui kuonga pea ta‘engata. ‘Ēmeni.
Si‘i ‘ofa‘anga, ‘oua te mou ofo ‘i he vela kuo hoko kiate kimoutolu mo‘omou ‘ahi‘ahi‘i, ‘o hangē ko ha me‘a fo‘ou ia kuo hoko noa atu:
kaekehe ke mou fiefia, ‘o fakatatau ki ho‘omou kau ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ‘a Kalaisi; koe‘uhi ke mou fiefia foki mo hākailangitau ‘i he fakae‘a ‘o ‘ene lāngilangi‘ia.
Ka kuo manukia kimoutolu ‘i he huafa ‘o Kalaisi, tā ko e toki kakai monū‘ia kimoutolu; he ‘oku nofo‘i kimoutolu ‘e he Laumālie ‘oku ‘a‘ana ‘a e lāngilangi, ‘io, ko e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otua.
Seuke, ke ‘oua na‘a ai hamou toko taha ‘e mo‘ua ha mamahi ko ha‘ane fakapō, pe kaiha‘a, pe fai kovi, pe ko ha‘ane kaunoa ‘i ha me‘a.
Ka ‘oka ngaohi pehe‘i ia ko ‘ene Kalisitiane, ke ‘oua te ne mā, ka ne fakahīkihiki‘i ‘a e ‘Otua koe‘uhi ko e hingoa ko ia.
He ko e kuonga ‘eni ke kamata ‘a e fakamaau mei he ‘api ‘o e ‘Otua: pea kapau ‘oku fua fai kiate kitautolu, ko e hā tū honau iku‘anga, ‘a kinautolu ‘oku nau talangata‘a ki he Kōsipeli ‘a e ‘Otua?
Pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke meimei hao ‘a e mā‘oni‘oni, pea ‘e tu‘u ‘i fē ‘a e faka‘otuamate mo e angahala?
Ko ia, ko kinautolu foki ‘oku mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi mamahi ‘i he finangalo ‘o e ‘Otua, ke nau tuku honau laumālie ‘i he failelei ki he Tupu‘i-‘Otua ‘a ia ko e Toko Taha ‘oku fai ki he‘ene lea.
